text: Zhang Wenkang(born 1940 in Nanhui, Shanghai) was the health minister of China during the SARS outbreak who was sacked for mishandling the matter. Zhang was a supporter of Jiang Zemin, former General Secretary of the Communist Party of China. After he was fired, he was placed in various ceremonial positions. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:People's Republic of China politicians from Shanghai
title: Zhang Wenkang
